content:
Hi, quick question, is there some kind of 2021 equivalent of the rust-2018-idioms lint group?
rustc -W help | grep 2021 lists a couple of items but these seem to be individual lints.
there are no idiom lints this time, only migration lints
rust-2021-compatibility is the group for the migration lints
matthiaskrgr has marked this topic as resolved.
